name: Villa Italia Grapefruit Soda
review: This is definitely an underrated drink in trader joes. It is by far one of my favorite drinks from any market, it has the right amount of sourness along with its carbon making everything just right. I would definitely recommend everyone that likes a sour flavor to try it out.

name: Lego Rose
review: I got this as a gift for my birthday and I really liked it because I got the second joy from the gift after building
